title: Ziff Davis Completes Two Acquisitions in Q3 2022
dc:creator: Jeremy Jones
description:
Ziff Davis, Inc. (NASDAQ: ZD), announced today that it completed two acquisitions in the third quarter of 2022.

The post Ziff Davis Completes Two Acquisitions in Q3 2022 appeared first on Ziff Davis.
content:encoded:
